hero.name: Erick Sang Cifuentes
hero.title: Data Engineer
hero.description: Passionate about turning complex data challenges into elegant solutions that drive business growth and innovation
dynamicDescriptions: Passionate about turning complex data challenges into elegant solutions that drive business growth and innovation
Designing efficient data structures and schemas that optimize performance and enable scalable analytics
Building robust ETL processes that transform raw data into clean, reliable datasets for business intelligence
Creating automated data workflows that reduce manual effort and ensure consistent, high-quality outputs
Developing analytical solutions that turn data into actionable insights for strategic decision-making

expertise.title: Data Engineering Excellence
expertise.description: Strong experience building ETL pipelines, data warehouses, and automated data workflows using Python, SQL, and modern data stack tools.

expertise.title: Cloud Platform Fundamentals
expertise.description: Working knowledge of AWS and Azure services with hands-on experience in basic cloud storage, compute, and database solutions.

expertise.title: Analytics & BI Development
expertise.description: Practical experience creating dashboards and reports using Power BI, with skills in data visualization and business intelligence implementation.

expertise.title: Machine Learning Implementation
expertise.description: Applied experience integrating ML models into data pipelines, with familiarity in Python ML libraries and basic model deployment.

expertise.title: Data Quality & Governance
expertise.description: Hands-on experience implementing data validation, quality checks, and documentation practices in real-world data projects.

expertise.title: Automation & Basic DevOps
expertise.description: Working knowledge of CI/CD tools, basic containerization with Docker, and automation scripting for data workflows.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Professional certifications and credentials that validate my expertise in data engineering and cloud technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Data Engineer and lifelong learner who thrives at the intersection of data, programming, and continuous innovation. What drives me isn't just building solutions ‚Äì it's the constant pursuit of knowledge, the elegance of clean code, and the thrill of transforming complex challenges into scalable, impactful systems.

professionalValue.title: What I Bring to Your Team
professionalValue.content: I deliver end-to-end data solutions with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and business impact. My approach combines strong technical fundamentals with a growth mindset, ensuring I not only solve today's challenges but also adapt quickly to tomorrow's opportunities.

items.title: Data Engineering Excellence
items.description: Building robust ETL pipelines, data warehouses, and real-time processing systems that scale with your business needs.

items.title: Programming Craftsmanship
items.description: Writing clean, maintainable code in Python, SQL, and modern frameworks. I believe code should tell a story and be built to last.

items.title: Continuous Learning
items.description: Staying ahead of industry trends, rapidly adopting new technologies, and sharing knowledge with the team to drive collective growth.

problemSolver.title: Problem-Solving Approach
problemSolver.content: I approach every challenge with curiosity and systematic thinking. Whether it's optimizing a pipeline that processes millions of records, debugging complex data quality issues, or architecting solutions for future scalability, I combine analytical rigor with creative problem-solving to deliver results that matter.

learningDriven.title: Learning & Growth Mindset
learningDriven.content: Technology evolves rapidly, and so do I. I'm constantly exploring new tools, techniques, and methodologies. From cloud technologies to machine learning frameworks, I embrace change as an opportunity to grow and bring fresh perspectives to every project.

beyondWork.title: Beyond the Code
beyondWork.content: When I'm not coding or designing data systems, you'll find me exploring emerging technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying life's simple pleasures.
beyondWork.quote: Code with purpose, learn without limits, build for the future

technical.title: Technical Excellence
technical.subtitle: Skills & Technologies
technical.description: Comprehensive expertise across the modern data stack and cloud technologies, enabling end-to-end solution development.
